amendment.description: To establish a life-saving program to prevent drug and opioid abuse in Medicare.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3367 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 3367 proposed by Senator Grassley for Senator Toomey to Amendment SA 3378. (consideration: CR S1192, S1198, S1204-1205) To establish a life-saving program to prevent drug and opioid abuse in Medicare.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3367 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3367 proposed by Senator Grassley for Senator Toomey to Amendment SA 3378.
